description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=2/3, Mature Content=0/3. 1-4 Player Multi-Platform 2-D Fighting greatness!  Think of this as Battle-X featuring better backgrounds, remixed music and new moves for all characters.  Multiple levels of difficulty are also available.  Counters, block breakers, and Super Combos are some of the new features that make Battle-SX an action pack slugfest.
description.short: 1-4 Player Multi-Platform 2-D Fighting greatness!  Think of this as Battle-X featuring better backgrounds, remixed music and new moves for all characters.  Multiple levels of difficulty are also available.  Counters, block breakers, and Super Combos are some of the new features that make Battle-SX an action pack slugfest.
